Original photo by Erica

¡Hola! My name is Javier Arce, comme tout le monde. I'm a creative developer, ethical designer, attentive reader, casual illustrator, frustrated zine-maker, compulsive photographer, and all-around silly human.

Right now I'm in Barcelona, Spain. I'm currently reading: How to Write an Autobiographical Novel. The last book I read was The Motern Method by Matt Farley. The last movie I watched was Sanjuro and I liked it a lot.

About this computer

This computer contains an amulet, a sphinx, 311 blog posts, a collection of silly songs, 356 photos, one pun, 58 drawings, a modest blogroll with 27 fantastic blogs and newsletters, a hidden passage to another dimension, a ghost story, a newsletter that reaches 133 subscribers, a list of dog names, a list of names that aren’t dog names, references to 28 of my personal projects, a pretty accurate list of all the movies I’ve watched since 2020, a pretty inaccurate list of all the books I’ve read, references to my early memories, 3 maps listing 104 of my favorite places in the world, several photos of myself eating ice cream, a mirror, a coin, a yellow bird, a photo of your turtle, a turtle.

This computer was updated on February 15, 2026 by a wizard.

Wait, there’s more!
